newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentina to sell treasury bills Oct 18. [CORRECTED 00:15 GMT 11/10/96]
newsitem.headline: Argentina to sell treasury bills Oct 18. [CORRECTED 00:15 GMT 11/10/96]

text.p: Argentina will sell 250 million pesos in 91-day treasury bills (Letes) and $500 million in 364-day treasury bills on October 18, the Economy Ministry said Thursday (Corrects amounts for both 91-day and 364-day treasury bills.)
Bids are due by 1400 local/1700 GMT.
The 91-day bills are due on January 17 and 364-day bills mature on October 17, 1997.
The issues will settle on October 18, 1996.

Some 50 million pesos of the 91-day bills will be sold through non-competitive bids and the remaining 250 million pesos will be placed through competitive bids. Some $50 million of the 364-day bills will be sold through non-competitive bids with the remainder to be auctioned in competitive bids.
